```{=html}
<script>
(function () {
  const root = document.getElementById("italyCarousel");
  if (!root) return;
  
  const track = root.querySelector(".carousel-track");
  const slides = root.querySelectorAll(".carousel-slide");
  const prev = root.querySelector(".prev");
  const next = root.querySelector(".next");
  
  let index = 0;
  const gap = 16;
  
  function update() {
    if (slides.length === 0) return;
    const slideWidth = slides[0].getBoundingClientRect().width;
    track.style.transform = `translateX(${-index * (slideWidth + gap)}px)`;
    
    // Disable buttons at boundaries
    prev.style.opacity = index === 0 ? '0.3' : '1';
    prev.style.cursor = index === 0 ? 'default' : 'pointer';
    next.style.opacity = index === slides.length - 1 ? '0.3' : '1';
    next.style.cursor = index === slides.length - 1 ? 'default' : 'pointer';
  }
  
  prev.addEventListener("click", () => {
    if (index > 0) {
      index--;
      update();
    }
  });
  
  next.addEventListener("click", () => {
    if (index < slides.length - 1) {
      index++;
      update();
    }
  });
  
  // Better resize handling with debounce
  let resizeTimer;
  window.addEventListener("resize", () => {
    clearTimeout(resizeTimer);
    resizeTimer = setTimeout(update, 100);
  });
  
  // Initialize
  setTimeout(update, 100);
})();
</script>
```
